OOC: There's a battle going on? Must have missed it!

My Maximals, except f=
or Plintissa, go off to the battle...

m: Alloran2@...

 09, 2001 3:04 PM

  =
OOC: Thanks Zardus 

  :::Wheeljack/Ratchet/Torca::: 

  Wheeljack: I think=
 we can modify some missles to create torpedos from the 
  storage. 
  ::He=
 starts walking to the storage area, motioning for Composer to follow::

~~~~~ 
  ::Torca gets hit by some of the lasers.  he fires 2 charges at the=
 shuttle:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Ratchet gets hit by a few laser shots, and fires 1=
5 shots from each gun and 
  2 tusk missles at the shuttle::
